DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
This effect triggers if the last card played was an #yAttack.

Ignited creatures lose #b1 #yStrength and Increment your own #yStrength by #b1 at the end of the monster's turn. NL Ignited creatures also increment your sanctuary:Volatile_Flame by #1 at the end of the monsters' turn. NL Each turn, creatures with Ignited have this power's amount reduced by #b1.
You can only play up to #b3 Spell Cards per turn.
This effect triggers if you have died this combat.
Collect five #yFragments to unleash a powerful Spell Card attack.
When you would die, revive with 100% of your Max HP, NL clear your debuffs and gain #yExhaustion instead. NL You give up if #yExhaustion would reach #b3.
Your flame is volatile and frequent to change.
